ai-tha-ap218:2.1_0: The lie down on the same sheet
ai-tha-ap218:2.3_0: and it’s due to that perception
ai-tha-ap218:2.4_0: I’ve attained the ending of defilements.
ai-tha-ap218:4.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
ai-tha-ap218:5.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Sandhāna.
ai-tha-ap218:6.1_0: The sixth part of the senior monks is completed.
